programme.desc: In an extremely rare decision, the Catholic Church officially recognized the demonic possession of Emily Rose, a 19-year-old Minnesota college freshman. An exorcism was performed and recorded, and that recording played a pivotal role in the events that followed. Told in terrifying flashbacks, this film chronicles the haunting trial of the priest accused of criminal negligence resulting in the death of the young girl believed to be possessed. Starring Laura Linney.(n)

programme.title: Max Steel
programme.desc: Teenager Max McGrath moves back to Copper Canyon, the town where his scientist father died under mysterious circumstances. Adjusting to a new school is not easy for Max, and it becomes even more complicated when his body starts to generate strange energy flare-ups that he can't control. This unpredictable power surge grows too intense for Max to handle and he is forced to distance himself from those around him. On the brink of fatal combustion, Max is rescued by Steel, an extraterrestrial who has been secretly monitoring his progress.(n)

programme.title: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: Academy Award winner Steven Spielberg directs this vision of a theme park featuring genetically-engineered dinosaurs. Who will survive when the dinosaurs run amok? Academy Award winner Richard Attenborough stars as misguided tycoon, John Hammond. Sam Neill and Academy Award nominees Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum, and Samuel L. Jackson also star as the experts brought in to analyze the nuances of the new park.(n)

programme.title: King Arthur
programme.desc: An adventure that tells the true story of Arthur (Clive Owen) and his bond of brotherhood with Lancelot (Ioan Gruffudd) and the Knights Of The Round Table as they fight for freedom and those they love. Co-starring Keira Knightley.(n)

programme.title: Get The Gringo
programme.desc: An already bad day for Driver is not getting any better. He makes a big haul of millions that would give him a nice summer vacation on easy street, but it goes south - literally. During a high-speed car chase with the US Border Patrol and a bleeding body in his back seat, Driver flips his car smashing through the border wall, tumbling violently, coming to a stop in Mexico. Apprehended by the Mexican authorities, he is sent to a hard-core prison where he enters the strange and dangerous world of "El Pueblito". Starring Mel Gibson.(n)

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: A talented young getaway driver (Ansel Elgort) relies on the beat of his personal soundtrack to be the best in the game. When he meets the girl of his dreams (Lily James), Baby sees a chance to ditch his criminal life and make a clean getaway. But after being coerced into working for a crime boss (Kevin Spacey), he must face the music when a doomed heist threatens his life, love and freedom.(n)

programme.title: War Horse
programme.desc: From legendary director Steven Spielberg comes an epic adventure: a tale of incredible loyalty, hope, and tenacity. Based on the Tony® Award-winning Broadway play, and set against the sweeping canvas of World War I, this deeply heartfelt story begins with the remarkable friendship between a horse named Joey and his young trainer Albert. When they're forced apart by war, we follow Joey's extraordinary journey as he changes and inspires the lives of everyone he meets. Starring Emily Watson and David Thewlis.(n)

programme.title: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: Academy Award winner Steven Spielberg directs this vision of a theme park featuring genetically-engineered dinosaurs. Who will survive when the dinosaurs run amok? Academy Award winner Richard Attenborough stars as misguided tycoon, John Hammond. Sam Neill and Academy Award nominees Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum, and Samuel L. Jackson also star as the experts brought in to analyze the nuances of the new park.(n)

programme.title: Push (2009)
programme.desc: A clairvoyant teenager (Dakota Fanning) and a telekinetic fugitive (Chris Evans) team up to find a missing woman who is the key to exposing a sinister, secret government agency that's building a clandestine army of psychic warriors. Djimon Hounsou costars in this sci-fi action thriller.

programme.title: Max Steel
programme.desc: Teenager Max McGrath moves back to Copper Canyon, the town where his scientist father died under mysterious circumstances. Adjusting to a new school is not easy for Max, and it becomes even more complicated when his body starts to generate strange energy flare-ups that he can't control. This unpredictable power surge grows too intense for Max to handle and he is forced to distance himself from those around him. On the brink of fatal combustion, Max is rescued by Steel, an extraterrestrial who has been secretly monitoring his progress.

programme.title: The Flying Scotsman
programme.desc: This inspiring sports drama is the true story of Scottish bicyclist Graeme Obree, who broke the world one-hour cycling record in 1993 on a bicycle he designed and built from scrap metal and washing machine parts. Jonny Lee Miller, Laura Fraser, Brian Cox and Billy Boyd costar.

programme.title: Gambler's Ballad: The Legend of Johnny Thompson
programme.desc: This film explores one of the greatest magicians and magic minds in history, Johnny Thompson. He teaches fellow magician Penn Jillette his signature piece called Gambler's Ballad.

programme.title: I Am David
programme.desc: A young boy named David (Ben Tibber) flees a Communist prison camp in 1950's Bulgaria and embarks on a remarkable cross-cultural odyssey to deliver a letter to a stranger in Denmark. James Caviezel and Joan Plowright costar in this moving drama based on the novel "North to Freedom" by Anne Holm and directed by Paul Feig of TV's "Freaks and Geeks.".

programme.title: Babe
programme.desc: Young Babe has no way of knowing how much his world is about to change when his mother is suddenly hauled off in a truck that takes pigs away. Babe then arrives at the farm of Mr. Hoggett and his large and lively wife, Esme. All kinds of species live on the farm, and some of the animals welcome Babe with open paws, while a few resent the friendly little porker. Babe's approach to the barnyard life is different from all the others, and he goes to great lengths to find acceptance.

programme.title: Bigfoot and the Burtons
programme.desc: When an ignored little boy bonds with Bigfoot and discovers the human-like ape is in danger, he finds the courage to stand up to those bigger than him to save the creature and set his new friend free.

programme.title: Crowning Jules
programme.desc: Jules is a bright and sassy 17 year-old who desperately wants to leave her Midwestern family's alumni traditions behind, but to get to her once-in-a-lifetime Harvard admissions interview, she's forced to hitch a ride with her twin sister/nemesis, Madison, who is headed to a beauty pageant. Their road trip takes a turn when the teenage sisters unwittingly come into possession of a stolen jewel and are pursued by dangerous thieves.

programme.title: Muhammad Ali: The Greatest. Of All Time.
programme.desc: In the early 1980s, after his recent and high profile defeat to Larry Holmes, boxing legend Muhammad Ali takes it upon himself to talk a suicidal stranger down from a ledge. Using his unique brand of wit and wisdom, he succeeds in persuading the man that life is worth living, and learns a huge amount about himself in the process. Starring Noel Clarke as Muhammad Ali, Osy Ikhile as Joe, Lucian Msamati as Herbert Muhammad and Danny John-Jules as Don King.

programme.title: Different Flowers
programme.desc: Uptight Millie Haven (Emma Bell) has always followed the rules, but when she has doubts before her big Kansas City wedding, her attitude-prone little sister Emma (Hope Lauren), comes to the rescue. They embark on a spontaneous road trip to their grandmother's farm where, with the help of Grandma Mildred (Shelley Long), they rediscover their bond. They meet a local hunk with a heart of gold, and a host of only-in-the-Midwest characters as they pick up the pieces of Millie's life.

programme.title: The Host
programme.desc: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over their bodies and erasing their memories, Melanie (Saoirse Ronan) risks everything to protect the people she loves — her friends, her brother and her Uncle Jeb (William Hurt).

programme.title: Swing Away
programme.desc: Following a meltdown that leads to a suspension, professional golfer Zoe Papadopoulos travels to her grandparents' village in Greece to escape the harsh spotlight of the international sports world. Between baking bread and eating baklava, she meets and mentors a ten-year-old girl who is determined to become the next golf sensation. Along the way, Zoe rediscovers her Greek heritage, her love of the game and the hidden strength within herself.

programme.title: The Longshots
programme.desc: A former high school football star gets his self-respect back when he lands a job coaching the local Pop Warner team with his athletically gifted niece as quarterback. Ice Cube stars in this sports comedy with Keke Palmer and Dash Mihok.

programme.title: Shanghai Noon
programme.desc: The Wild West meets the Far East in a battle for honor, royalty and gold when acrobatic Chinese Imperial Guard Chon Wang (Jackie Chan) comes to America to rescue beautiful Princess Pei Pei (Lucy Liu) who has been kidnapped from The Forbidden City. With the help of a partner he doesn't trust (Owen Wilson), a wife he didn't expect (Brandon Merrill), a horse with a personality all its own and martial arts moves no one can believe, Chon finds himself facing the meanest gunslingers in the West.

programme.title: Surviving The Wild
programme.desc: Following the untimely death of his grandpa Gus (Jon Voight), thirteen-year-old Shaun (Aidan Cullen) disregards his parent's wishes and embarks on a journey with his dog Riley, to spread his grandpa's ashes in the wild. Throughout the journey, Shaun is guided by the spirit of his grandfather. Together they overcome challenge after challenge, as Shaun traverses white water rapids and tries to evade two crazed hillbillies that are on his tail.

programme.title: The Host
programme.desc: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over their bodies and erasing their memories, Melanie (Saoirse Ronan) risks everything to protect the people she loves — her friends, her brother and her Uncle Jeb (William Hurt).

programme.title: The Space Between Us
programme.desc: Shortly after arriving to help colonize Mars, an astronaut dies while giving birth to the first human born on the red planet, unable to reveal who the father is. The child, Gardner Elliot, is an inquisitive, highly intelligent boy who reaches the age of 16 having only met 14 people in his life. While searching for clues about his father, and the home planet he's never known, Gardner begins an online friendship with a street-smart girl named Tulsa. He arrives on Earth, eager to experience all of the wonders he's only read about.

programme.title: A Rumor of Angels
programme.desc: Haunted by the car accident that claimed his mother's life, a 12-year-old Maine boy (Trevor Morgan) befriends an eccentric local woman (Vanessa Redgrave), whose presence in his life galvanizes his fractured family. Ray Liotta, Catherine McCormack and Ron Livingston costar in this drama based on the book "Thy Son Liveth: Messages from a Soldier to His Mother" by Grace Duffie.

programme.title: Festival in Cannes
programme.desc: Dazzling Mediterranean vistas frame this wry and acerbic tale of cinema art versus mass-market commerce from Henry Jaglom. A legendary European screen star (Anouk Aimee) becomes the decisive player in a face-off pitting an actress-turned-independent filmmaker (Greta Scacchi) against a high-powered Hollywood producer (Ron Silver), both of whom are trying to put together deals for prospective film projects at the Cannes Film Festival. "A giddy comic fantasy, full of romance, chicanery and beguiling, sophisticated players" - "Los Angeles Times.".

programme.title: Who Gets the Dog?
programme.desc: After deciding to call their marriage quits, Olive (Alicia Silverstone) and Clay (Ryan Kwanten) both want custody of their beloved dog Wesley. Facing a court-ordered 60-day review to determine who'll get the pooch, Olive and Clay try their doggone best to win over the judge in this romantic comedy about what happens when puppy love goes to the dogs.

programme.title: Different Flowers
programme.desc: Uptight Millie Haven (Emma Bell) has always followed the rules, but when she has doubts before her big Kansas City wedding, her attitude-prone little sister Emma (Hope Lauren), comes to the rescue. They embark on a spontaneous road trip to their grandmother's farm where, with the help of Grandma Mildred (Shelley Long), they rediscover their bond. They meet a local hunk with a heart of gold, and a host of only-in-the-Midwest characters as they pick up the pieces of Millie's life.

programme.title: Against the Tide
programme.desc: A Showtime Sports chronicle of the seminal 1970 college football matchup between Alabama's Crimson Tide and USC Trojans at Birmingham's Legion Field. Through interviews with former Alabama legends Joe Namath, John Mitchell and USC stars Sam "Bam" Cunningham, Jimmy Jones and more, this documentary examines coach Paul "Bear" Bryant's surprising decision to bring a dominant, racially integrated football team onto the field in Birmingham for the very first time and reveals the impact college football played in the struggle for integration.

programme.title: Middle School: The Worst Years of My Life
programme.desc: Rafe has an epic imagination and a slight problem with authority. When he transfers to a new school, Rafe and his scheming best friend Leo hatch a plan to break every rule in the school's code of conduct. This causes a battle with the principal, which explodes into chaos both real and imagined. Rafe struggles to hide his misbehavior from Jeanne, the straight-A, overachieving girl of his dreams, while at home, his mother's boyfriend - a moochy, jack-of-no-trades named Bear - threatens to become his stepfather.

programme.title: Cody the Robosapien
programme.desc: When a 12-year-old boy discovers a broken robot, he finds a zany and powerful new best friend who can change his life for the better but when the evil corporation that funded the robot's creation intervenes, the pair must team up to save their family.

programme.title: Confessions of A Teenage Drama Queen
programme.desc: Lindsay Lohan stars as Lola, whose family moves from the center of everything in New York City to the center of a cultural wasteland in suburban New Jersey. She feels her life is simply not worth living, but no matter who or what gets in the way, Lola won't give up on her life's ambition to be a star.

programme.title: Jurassic School
programme.desc: Nerdy middle schooler Tommy is forced take care of a baby dinosaur after his cloned science fair project hatches early. He quickly begins to think of the creature not only as a pet, but also as a friend. But when the dinosaur escapes on the day of the fair, Tommy must figure out a way to get the creature back before greedy grown-ups get to him first.

programme.title: Shifting Gears
programme.desc: Tom is a hard-working manager at a big box super store. He started in the stock room, always imagining himself at the helm. Now poised for a big promotion, he gets the news he always feared: no college degree means no promotion. In the face of this new reality, and lamenting the time he devoted to work over family, Tom and his wife Carol decide to change course and start a family business. They pack up their kids and move to a small town to take over a run-down garage bequeathed to them by Tom's estranged father.

programme.title: Tim & Faith: Soul2Soul
programme.desc: Includes live performances from Tim McGraw and Faith Hill's 2017 Soul2Soul world tour, as well as an intimate look inside their relationship. Never before seen interviews are presented along side behind-the-scenes footage, capturing their chemistry on and off the stage. Directed and executive produced by the award-winning team of Dan Cutforth and Jane Lipsitz.

programme.title: The Promise
programme.desc: Brilliant medical student Michael (Oscar Isaac) meets beautiful dance instructor Ana (Charlotte Le Bon) in late 1914. Their shared Armenian heritage sparks an attraction that turns into a romantic rivalry between Michael and Ana's boyfriend (Christian Bale), an American photojournalist. As the Ottoman Empire crumbles into war-torn chaos, their conflicting passions must be put aside as they join forces to get themselves to safety.

programme.title: Confessions of A Teenage Drama Queen
programme.desc: Lindsay Lohan stars as Lola, whose family moves from the center of everything in New York City to the center of a cultural wasteland in suburban New Jersey. She feels her life is simply not worth living, but no matter who or what gets in the way, Lola won't give up on her life's ambition to be a star.(n)

programme.title: The Stepford Wives
programme.desc: Nicole Kidman, Matthew Broderick and Christopher Walken star in this satirical remake of the classic thriller about a planned community where the picture-perfect women are a little too eerily flawless. Glenn Close, Bette Midler, Jon Lovitz and Roger Bart costar in this wickedly acerbic comedy from writer Paul Rudnick ("Addams Family Values," "In & Out").(n)

programme.title: Cairo Time
programme.desc: A diplomat's wife (Patricia Clarkson) stranded in Cairo, Egypt finds herself attracted to an old friend of her husband's who volunteers to guide her around the city during her stay. Alexander Siddig costars with Elena Anaya in this romantic culture clash drama.(n)

programme.title: Major League II
programme.desc: The Indians are now a World Series contender. But last season's hunger is now replaced with complacency and bad decisions by the new owner that threaten to tear the team apart.(n)

programme.title: Touchback
programme.desc: Former high school football star turned farmer and family man Scott Murphy (Brian Presley) finds himself with a unique opportunity to revisit the championship game where he permanently injured his knee in a game-winning play. Given a second shot at football fame, Scott seeks counsel from his longtime mentor, Coach Hand (Kurt Russell), to help him decide whether to let his fate unfold or follow a path that will change his future.(n)

programme.title: Mrs McCutcheon
programme.desc: Having always felt he was born in the wrong body, 10-year-old Tom chooses the name Mrs McCutcheon rather than the name he was given at birth; he also prefers the flow of a dress rather than the cut of a pant. Now at his third school, Tom is having trouble settling in and finding acceptance from his newfound peers - except for Trevor, a tough little charmer who also suffers prejudice due to his Aboriginal heritage.(n)

programme.title: Middle School: The Worst Years of My Life
programme.desc: Rafe has an epic imagination and a slight problem with authority. When he transfers to a new school, Rafe and his scheming best friend Leo hatch a plan to break every rule in the school's code of conduct. This causes a battle with the principal, which explodes into chaos both real and imagined. Rafe struggles to hide his misbehavior from Jeanne, the straight-A, overachieving girl of his dreams, while at home, his mother's boyfriend - a moochy, jack-of-no-trades named Bear - threatens to become his stepfather.(n)

programme.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey
programme.desc: When a displaced Indian family opens a restaurant in the south of France, just 100 feet from a Michelin star restaurant, a culinary war ensues between the two establishments. Stars Academy Award® winner Helen Mirren.(n)

programme.title: Babe
programme.desc: Young Babe has no way of knowing how much his world is about to change when his mother is suddenly hauled off in a truck that takes pigs away. Babe then arrives at the farm of Mr. Hoggett and his large and lively wife, Esme. All kinds of species live on the farm, and some of the animals welcome Babe with open paws, while a few resent the friendly little porker. Babe's approach to the barnyard life is different from all the others, and he goes to great lengths to find acceptance.(n)

programme.title: Bigfoot and the Burtons
programme.desc: When an ignored little boy bonds with Bigfoot and discovers the human-like ape is in danger, he finds the courage to stand up to those bigger than him to save the creature and set his new friend free.(n)

programme.title: Shanghai Noon
programme.desc: The Wild West meets the Far East in a battle for honor, royalty and gold when acrobatic Chinese Imperial Guard Chon Wang (Jackie Chan) comes to America to rescue beautiful Princess Pei Pei (Lucy Liu) who has been kidnapped from The Forbidden City. With the help of a partner he doesn't trust (Owen Wilson), a wife he didn't expect (Brandon Merrill), a horse with a personality all its own and martial arts moves no one can believe, Chon finds himself facing the meanest gunslingers in the West.(n)

programme.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey
programme.desc: When a displaced Indian family opens a restaurant in the south of France, just 100 feet from a Michelin star restaurant, a culinary war ensues between the two establishments. Stars Academy Award® winner Helen Mirren.(n)

programme.title: Daddy Day Care
programme.desc: Two fathers (Eddie Murphy and Jeff Garlin) join the ranks of the unemployed. They are forced to take their sons out of the exclusive Chapman Academy and become stay-at-home fathers. With no job possibilities on the horizon, the two dads decide to open their own day care facility, which boasts some fairly unconventional methods of tending the kids. As their day care starts to catch on, it launches them into a competition with Chapman Academy's tough-as-nails director (Anjelica Huston) for the hearts and minds of the children.(n)

programme.title: Are We Done Yet?
programme.desc: Now married to Suzanne (Nia Long), Nick Persons (Ice Cube) has bought a quiet suburban house to escape the rat race of the big city and to provide more space for his new wife and kids. But when his new home quickly becomes a costly fixer upper and he finds himself at the mercy of an eccentric contractor (John C. McGinley), Nick's suburban dream soon becomes a nightmare.(n)

programme.title: The Babadook
programme.desc: Six years after the violent death of her husband, Amelia (Essie Davis) is at a loss. She struggles to discipline her out-of-control son, Samuel (Noah Wiseman), who she finds impossible to love. Samuel's dreams are plagued by a monster he believes is coming to kill them both. When a disturbing storybook turns up at their house, Samuel is convinced that the Babadook is the creature he's been dreaming about. His hallucinations spiral out of control, he becomes more unpredictable and violent.

programme.title: Bad Girl
programme.desc: Amy must fight to save her adoptive parents from their self-styled vengeful blood daughter, Chloe.

programme.title: The Killer Inside Me
programme.desc: A deputy sheriff (Casey Affleck) in a small West Texas town of the 1950's tries with increasing desperation to hide his tortured, sadomasochistic affair with a prostitute (Jessica Alba), as well as the fact that he is a serial killer. Kate Hudson costars in this gritty, hard-boiled drama.

programme.title: Jane Wants a Boyfriend
programme.desc: A bright-eyed young woman in her mid-20s living with autism, and enamored of old Hollywood romantic movies, decides she wants a boyfriend and when she meets a charming sous chef, it seems that true romance might be possible.

programme.title: Against the Current
programme.desc: Justin Kirk and Joseph Fiennes star in this independent drama about a middle-aged man who decides to fulfill a childhood dream of swimming 150 miles of the Hudson River with his best friend rowing alongside for encouragement, but a bittersweet hidden agenda for the feat is gradually revealed. Mary Tyler Moore costars.

programme.title: Bang Bang Baby
programme.desc: In this dreamy sci-fi musical set in the 1960s, an isolated small town teenager believes her hopes of becoming a famous singer will come true when her rock star idol gets stranded in town and romance blooms between them but a leak in a nearby chemical plant threatens to turn her dream into a nightmare.

programme.title: Heartbeats
programme.desc: A feisty American hip hop dancer travels to India with her family for a wedding and falls in love - both with a new style of dance, and with the determined young man who introduces it to her.

programme.title: Cocktail
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is Brian Flanagan, a young, confident and ambitious bartender who, with the help of a seasoned pro (Bryan Brown), becomes the toast of Manhattan's Upper East Side. But when he moves to Jamaica and meets an independent artist (Elisabeth Shue), their vivid romance brings a new perspective to the self-centered bartender's life.

programme.title: This Isn't Funny
programme.desc: Eliot is a stand up comedian with crippling anxiety, while Jamie avoids life through partying and travel. When Jamie rides his bike into Eliot's car their exchange is not exactly pleasant. Eliot then riffs on their encounter in her set that night and Jamie is there to see it. Suddenly the chemistry is undeniable. Just as they open themselves up and see they might be a fit, new job opportunities and family crises strain their relationship.

programme.title: Bad Grandmas
programme.desc: Senior citizens Mimi, Bobbi, Virginia and Coralee quietly live out their twilight years in Southern Missouri playing cards and baking cakes. Bobbi's son-in-law, Jim, cons her into losing her house and Mimi, the unofficial leader of the group, decides to take matters into her own hands. Things spin out of control when she confronts Jim and he accidentally gets killed in the altercation.

programme.title: The Girl On The Train
programme.desc: Rachel, who is devastated by her recent divorce, spends her daily commute fantasizing about the seemingly perfect couple who live in a house that her train passes every day. One morning she sees something shocking happen there and becomes entangled in the mystery that unfolds. Emily Blunt, Lisa Kudrow, Justin Theroux and Allison Janney star.

programme.title: I, Daniel Blake
programme.desc: Daniel Blake (Dave Johns) is a man out of time. He's a widowed woodworker who's never owned a computer and lives according to his own common sense moral code. After a heart attack leaves him unable to work and the state welfare system fails him, Daniel must stand up and fight for his dignity and lead a one-man crusade for compassion that transforms the lives of a single mother (Hayley Squires) and her two children.

programme.title: Vicky Cristina Barcelona
programme.desc: Romantic comedy-drama about a pair of American friends (Scarlett Johansson and Rebecca Hall) who vacation together in Spain and fall under the romantic spell of Juan, a passionate artist (Javier Bardem).

programme.title: Cocktail
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is Brian Flanagan, a young, confident and ambitious bartender who, with the help of a seasoned pro (Bryan Brown), becomes the toast of Manhattan's Upper East Side. But when he moves to Jamaica and meets an independent artist (Elisabeth Shue), their vivid romance brings a new perspective to the self-centered bartender's life.

programme.title: Comet
programme.desc: Justin Long and Emmy Rossum are star-crossed lovers in an alternate universe, whose relationship blooms and unravels over the course of six years. A chance encounter brings them together, and the story zigzags back and forth in time—from a meteor shower in LA, to an encounter in a Paris hotel room, to a fateful phone call— resulting in a portrait of the relationship between the cynical Dell (Long) and the quick-witted Kimberly (Rossum).

programme.title: Employee of the Month (2006)
programme.desc: A slacker box boy (Dane Cook) at a New Mexico superstore tries to impress a gorgeous new coworker (Jessica Simpson) by transforming himself into a model corporate drone, but runs up against the previous 17-time holder (Dax Shepard) of the store's "employee of the month" honor.(r)

programme.title: Comet
programme.desc: Justin Long and Emmy Rossum are star-crossed lovers in an alternate universe, whose relationship blooms and unravels over the course of six years. A chance encounter brings them together, and the story zigzags back and forth in time—from a meteor shower in LA, to an encounter in a Paris hotel room, to a fateful phone call— resulting in a portrait of the relationship between the cynical Dell (Long) and the quick-witted Kimberly (Rossum).(r)

programme.title: The Girl On The Train
programme.desc: Rachel, who is devastated by her recent divorce, spends her daily commute fantasizing about the seemingly perfect couple who live in a house that her train passes every day. One morning she sees something shocking happen there and becomes entangled in the mystery that unfolds. Emily Blunt, Lisa Kudrow, Justin Theroux and Allison Janney star.(r)

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with Natasha Leggero Part 2
programme.desc: Actress and comedian Natasha Leggero hosts an all-star lineup of the most hilarious minds in comedy, including Emo Phillips, Sean Patton, Ian Edwards, Kurt Braunohler and Eliza Skinner.(r)

programme.title: Beyond the Opposite Sex
programme.desc: This documentary picks up the respective stories of Rene and Jamie, 13 years after their Gender Affirmation Surgeries. The two subjects let us back into their very changed worlds and find that their surgeries, which had been lifelong goals, were far from the finish line of their journeys - in fact, they turned out to be only the beginning of more difficult, arduous and true lifelong experiences.(r)

programme.title: Vicky Cristina Barcelona
programme.desc: Romantic comedy-drama about a pair of American friends (Scarlett Johansson and Rebecca Hall) who vacation together in Spain and fall under the romantic spell of Juan, a passionate artist (Javier Bardem).(c)

programme.title: Mercy (2010)
programme.desc: A writer (Scott Caan) of highly sentimental love stories is secretly a womanizing cynic who has never actually experienced love, until he meets the beautiful and shockingly straightforward critic Mercy (Wendy Glenn), who is not fooled by his phony mawkishness. Erika Christensen costars in this romantic drama.(c)

programme.title: The Preacher's Wife
programme.desc: Denzel Washington stars as an angel named Dudley sent to Earth to help a minister's marriage (Courtney B. Vance) to his wife (Whitney Houston). Things take a twist when Dudley accidentally falls in love with her.(c)

programme.title: Whitney. "Can I Be Me"
programme.desc: Directors Nick Broomfield and Rudi Dolezal weave never before seen video, candid interviews and behind the scenes performance footage into a raw and uncensored portrait of Whitney Houston, who died suddenly at age 48 after years of struggling with addiction. Exploring her far-reaching impact, the directors focus on Houston's central dilemma: even though she had made millions of dollars and was recognized as having one of the greatest voices of all time, she still couldn't do what she wanted, either professionally or in her personal life.(c)

programme.title: Steel Magnolias
programme.desc: A wedding is about to take place in Chinquapin, Louisiana. The bride is Shelby (Julia Roberts), a headstrong young beauty whose iron-willed mother, M'Lynn (Sally Field), would do anything for her. Giant-haired Dolly Parton is Truvy, the owner of the beauty parlor that serves as the town's unofficial hub. Dropping in to exchange gossip are Ouiser (Shirley MacLaine), the richest and meanest woman in town, and Clairee (Olympia Dukakis), an elegant widow with a sly delivery. Together they provide each other with strength and friendship.(c)

programme.title: My One and Only
programme.desc: After she catches her husband cheating on her, a charming, flamboyant socialite packs her two young sons into a Coupe de Ville and embarks on a cross-country journey to find a new head of the family. Renee Zellweger, Logan Lerman and Kevin Bacon star in this comedy-drama loosely based on a true story.(c)

programme.title: Band Aid
programme.desc: Anna (Zoe Lister-Jones) and Ben (Adam Pally) are a couple who can't stop fighting. Advised by their therapist to try and work through their grief unconventionally, they are reminded of their shared love of music. In a last-ditch effort to save their marriage, they decide to turn all their fights into song, and with the help of their neighbor Dave (Fred Armisen), they start a band.(c)

programme.title: Whitney. "Can I Be Me"
programme.desc: Directors Nick Broomfield and Rudi Dolezal weave never before seen video, candid interviews and behind the scenes performance footage into a raw and uncensored portrait of Whitney Houston, who died suddenly at age 48 after years of struggling with addiction. Exploring her far-reaching impact, the directors focus on Houston's central dilemma: even though she had made millions of dollars and was recognized as having one of the greatest voices of all time, she still couldn't do what she wanted, either professionally or in her personal life.(c)

programme.title: The Preacher's Wife
programme.desc: Denzel Washington stars as an angel named Dudley sent to Earth to help a minister's marriage (Courtney B. Vance) to his wife (Whitney Houston). Things take a twist when Dudley accidentally falls in love with her.(c)

programme.title: Steel Magnolias
programme.desc: A wedding is about to take place in Chinquapin, Louisiana. The bride is Shelby (Julia Roberts), a headstrong young beauty whose iron-willed mother, M'Lynn (Sally Field), would do anything for her. Giant-haired Dolly Parton is Truvy, the owner of the beauty parlor that serves as the town's unofficial hub. Dropping in to exchange gossip are Ouiser (Shirley MacLaine), the richest and meanest woman in town, and Clairee (Olympia Dukakis), an elegant widow with a sly delivery. Together they provide each other with strength and friendship.(c)

programme.title: TIFFANY HADDISH: SHE READY! From the Hood to Hollywood!
programme.desc: In this hour-long special filmed at the Nate Holden Performing Arts Center, rising comedy star Tiffany Haddish takes the stage in her hometown of Los Angeles to tackle subjects ranging from her early days in foster care and being bullied on the playground, to getting her revenge on ex-boyfriends and introducing Will and Jada Pinkett Smith to Groupon.(c)

programme.title: The Whistleblower
programme.desc: Kathy (Academy Award® winner Rachel Weisz) is an American police officer who takes a job working as a peacekeeper in post-war Bosnia. Her expectations of helping to rebuild a devastated country are dashed when she uncovers a dangerous reality of corruption, cover-up and intrigue, amid a world of private contractors and multinational diplomatic doubletalk. Directed by Larysa Kondracki, the film also stars Academy Award® winner Vanessa Redgrave, Monica Bellucci and Academy Award® nominee David Strathairn.(c)

programme.title: Brimstone
programme.desc: Liz (Dakota Fanning) is full of heart and grit but is being hunted by a vengeful Preacher (Guy Pearce) who is a diabolical zealot. She's a genuine survivor and uses her strength to claim the better life she and her daughter deserve.(c)

programme.title: Steel Magnolias
programme.desc: A wedding is about to take place in Chinquapin, Louisiana. The bride is Shelby (Julia Roberts), a headstrong young beauty whose iron-willed mother, M'Lynn (Sally Field), would do anything for her. Giant-haired Dolly Parton is Truvy, the owner of the beauty parlor that serves as the town's unofficial hub. Dropping in to exchange gossip are Ouiser (Shirley MacLaine), the richest and meanest woman in town, and Clairee (Olympia Dukakis), an elegant widow with a sly delivery. Together they provide each other with strength and friendship.(c)

programme.title: Cairo Time
programme.desc: A diplomat's wife (Patricia Clarkson) stranded in Cairo, Egypt finds herself attracted to an old friend of her husband's who volunteers to guide her around the city during her stay. Alexander Siddig costars with Elena Anaya in this romantic culture clash drama.(n)

programme.title: Jenny's Wedding
programme.desc: Jenny Farrell has led an openly gay life with everyone except her family. She has kept it a secret out of compassion for her parents, knowing they are happiest living in a small, safe and familiar world. Realizing she is missing out on having a full life, Jenny decides to marry Kitty, a woman they thought was her roommate. Her parents are shocked to find out how little they know their daughter and fear becoming the object of gossip in their small community. Misunderstanding leads to misunderstanding, and long-standing grudges are revealed.(n)

programme.title: Margin Call
programme.desc: Set in the high-stakes world of the ﬁnancial industry, this film follows the key players at an investment ﬁrm during a 24-hour period in the early stages of the 2008 ﬁnancial crisis. When an entry-level analyst unlocks information that could prove to be the downfall of the ﬁrm, a roller-coaster ride ensues as decisions both ﬁnancial and moral catapult the lives of all involved into mayhem.(n)

programme.title: Romy And Michele's High School Reunion
programme.desc: Romy (Mira Sorvino) and Michele (Lisa Kudrow) are carefree party girls who reinvent themselves for their 10-year high school reunion. With new wardrobes and wild stories of success, they make a big impression, until a former classmate (Janeane Garofalo) blabs their real story to everyone! But that's when Romy and Michele let loose with a surprise of their own to outrageous results.(n)

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: Over-worked, over-committed and exhausted, Amy joins forces with two other stressed moms on a quest to liberate themselves from conventional responsibilities - going on a long overdue binge of freedom and fun that puts them on a collision course with the head of the PTA and her clique of perfect moms.(n)

programme.title: Wakefield
programme.desc: Successful suburbanite commuter Howard Wakefield (Bryan Cranston) takes a perverse detour from family life by vanishing without a trace. Hidden in the attic of his carriage house garage and surviving by scavenging at night, Howard secretly observes the lives of his wife (Jennifer Garner) and children and neighbors. He slowly realizes that he has not left his family, he has left himself.(n)

programme.title: Margin Call
programme.desc: Set in the high-stakes world of the ﬁnancial industry, this film follows the key players at an investment ﬁrm during a 24-hour period in the early stages of the 2008 ﬁnancial crisis. When an entry-level analyst unlocks information that could prove to be the downfall of the ﬁrm, a roller-coaster ride ensues as decisions both ﬁnancial and moral catapult the lives of all involved into mayhem.(n)

programme.title: The Thomas Crown Affair
programme.desc: Larceny mixes with romance in this caper film about a millionaire (Steve McQueen) who masterminds a bank heist for fun and then enters into a game of cat and mouse with the insurance investigator (Faye Dunaway) assigned the case. Michel Legrand's score was Oscar nominated, and the song "The Windmills of Your Mind" was named Best Song.

programme.title: The Getaway
programme.desc: An imprisoned bank robber is paroled but must rob a bank for a corrupt politician. He and his wife orchestrate the heist with two accomplices, but when things go wrong, the couple must go on the run. Based on the novel by Jim Thompson.

programme.title: Papillon
programme.desc: A fact-based tale of Henri Charriere's numerous escape attempts from Devil's Island, the infamous penal colony in French Guiana, where he was sent in 1931.

programme.title: An Enemy of the People
programme.desc: Version of Ibsen's 1883 play about a doctor's campaign against factory pollution.

programme.title: Weather Wizards
programme.desc: Entry in the "Pete Smith Specialty" series, focusing on meteorology and climatology. Directed by Fred Zinnemann. Alonzo Price, Ruth Robinson, John Dilson.

programme.title: AFI's Master Class - The Art of Collaboration
programme.desc: A series examining creative cinema partnerships. The opener looks at the works of filmmaker Steven Spielberg and composer John Williams, who began collaborating with 1974's "The Sugarland Express." Other films include "Close Encounters of the Third Kind," "Raiders of the Lost Ark" and "Schindler's List." (repeat).

programme.title: Smilin' Through
programme.desc: The old romantic classic about a love that endured the years makes a fine vehicle for Jeanette MacDonald in her prime. John: Brian Aherne. Kenneth: Gene Raymond. Ellen: Frances Robinson. Owen: Ian Hunter. Willie: Patrick O'Moore. Charles: Eric Lonsdale.

programme.title: Stand Up and Fight
programme.desc: An aristocrat accepts an offer to track down slave-running by the manager of a stage line.

programme.title: Roberta
programme.desc: Fred Astaire-Ginger Rogers musical about a football player who gets a crash course in the fashion industry when he inherits a couture empire in Paris.

programme.title: Andy Hardy's Private Secretary
programme.desc: Andy, about to graduate from high school, tries to help an unfortunate girl.(c)

programme.title: Wee Bit of Scotland
programme.desc: A tour of the Scottish highlands, including stops at Inverness, Loch Ness, the ancient capital of Perth, the Culloden Battlefield and St. Andrews Golf Club. Also: a visit to a cemetery for golfers.(c)

programme.title: The Little Minister
programme.desc: James M. Barrie's story of a pastor who must examine his conscience when his commitment to the village's labor movement is challenged by a free-spirited woman of the woods.

programme.title: Pride and Prejudice
programme.desc: Adaptation of Jane Austen's classic 1813 novel about romance and mores in pre-Victorian English society revolves around five middle-class sisters being courted by a variety of suitors. Of special note is the fractious relationship between spirited Elizabeth Bennet and haughty aristocrat Fitzwilliam Darcy.(c)

programme.title: All Girl Revue
programme.desc: Women take charge of city government for a day in this musical short, which features June Allyson as the mayor. Allyson sings "Let's Make a Note of That." Other numbers include "Information, Please," with Edith Brandell; and "I Love a Long Note," performed by opera singer Beverly Kirk.(c)

programme.title: The Women
programme.desc: An all-star, all-female cast is featured in an adaptation of the Clare Boothe Luce Broadway hit about a cabal of catty and chatty high-society women who chime in on the affairs of a loving wife and mother who's dealing with an adulterous husband.

programme.title: Conrack
programme.desc: The story of Pat Conroy, who taught impoverished black children on a South Carolina island to prepare them for life on the mainland. Based on Conroy's 1972 autobiographical novel "The Water Is Wide.

programme.title: The Great Santini
programme.desc: A great, but immature marine pilot builds character in his family by ordering them around like a commander, putting them through drills and hounding his sensitive eldest son. Based on actual events.

programme.title: The Prince of Tides
programme.desc: Barbra Streisand (who also directed) portrays a Manhattan psychiatrist who gets involved with her patient's brother and tries to exorcise the demons of their dysfunctional Southern family. An adaptation of the novel by Pat Conroy (who co-adapted with Becky Johnston). (cc).(c)

programme.title: Grand Canyon, Pride of Creation
programme.desc: Arizona is visited in this entry in the "Traveltalk" series. Included: the Painted Desert; two views of the Grand Canyon (one from the rim and the other via a mule ride down a trail).(c)

programme.title: White Line Fever
programme.desc: Jan-Michael Vincent as a young truck driver battling corruption on the road. Filmed in Arizona. Jerri: Kay Lenz. Duane: Slim Pickens. Buck: L.Q. Jones. Josh: Don Porter. Pops: Sam Laws. Carnell: Johnny Ray McGhee. Lucy: Leigh French. Prosecutor: R.G. Armstrong. Clem: Martin Kove. Jonathan Kaplan directed.(c)

programme.title: Chili and Chills
programme.desc: A couple driving through Mexico observe the local flora and fauna. (cc).(c)

programme.title: High-Ballin'
programme.desc: Peter Fonda and Jerry Reed team up as independent truckers battling hijackers in this action yarn replete with chases, crashes and shoot-outs. Helen Shaver, Chris Wiggins. Harvey: David Ferry. Tanker: Chris Langevin. Directed by Peter Carter.(c)

programme.title: It All Came True
programme.desc: Ann Sheridan and Humphrey Bogart in a tale about a gangster who converts a boardinghouse into a nightclub. Tom: Jeffrey Lynn. Miss Flint: ZaSu Pitts. Roberts: John Litel. Maggie: Una O'Connor. Boldini: Felix Bressart. Mrs. Taylor: Jessie Bushley. Directed by Lewis Seiler.

programme.title: The Little Wise Quacker
programme.desc: A duck hunter is thwarted by a rule that prohibits shooting before sunrise or shooting fowl while they're sleeping, which means he can only shoot at birds on the wing. Unfortunately, the only duck he finds after sunrise will neither wake up nor take flight.(c)

programme.title: Cyclone on Horseback
programme.desc: Tim Holt comes to the aid of a telephone contractor who has become the target of a saboteur. Mary Corbin: Marjorie Reynolds. Smokey: Ray Whitley. Whopper: Lee “Lasses” White. Cobb Wayne: Harry Worth. Jeff Corbin: Dennis Moore. Pete: Eddie Dew. Directed by Edward Killy.

programme.title: Goofy Movies Number One
programme.desc: Short features comical newsreel segments and clips from a silent movie with a humorous voice-over.

programme.title: Tailspin Tommy in the Great Air Mystery: Crash in the Clouds, The
Tarzan's Fight for Life
programme.desc: The jungle lord battles natives and animals to secure a vital serum. Gordon Scott, Eve Brent. Tartu: Rickie Sorensen. Futa: James Edwards. Anne: Jill Jarmyn. Sturdy: Carl Benton Reid. H. Bruce Humberstone directed.

programme.title: So You Want to be a Detective
programme.desc: “Joe McDoakes” short spoofing hard-boiled private-eye films. Joe, a.k.a. Phil Snarlow (George O'Hanlon), works a murder case while verbally sparring with narrator Art Gilmore. Directed by Richard Bare.

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: A filmmaker and his crew discover a gigantic ape during a shoot on a secluded island, and after run-ins with violent natives and prehistoric creatures bring the beast back to New York City, where it escapes and embarks on a terrifying rampage while attempting to protect the film's beautiful starlet.

programme.title: The Jackie Robinson Story
programme.desc: The second baseman portrays himself in this account of his breaking the color barrier in the majors.

programme.desc: In 1917, a wealthy rancher hires four mercenaries to retrieve his wife from the clutches of a desperado who is holding her hostage in a desert fortress in Mexico. Richard Brooks was nominated for Best Director and Best Adapted Screenplay.

programme.title: The Life and Times of Judge Roy Bean
programme.desc: A stern judge turns life upside down in a lawless frontier town. The locals then run him out of town, but when he returns to help his daughter, he discovers the town is worse than when he first arrived.

programme.title: Paths of Glory
programme.desc: Stanley Kubrick directed this gripping antiwar tract about a battlefield officer-lawyer defending three French soldiers unjustly accused of cowardice during World War I. Based on actual events.(n)

programme.title: The Man from Snowy River
programme.desc: After a terrible accident, the son of a livestock farmer is orphaned and forced off his land by mountain men who claim he must earn the right to his inheritance. He gets a job at a nearby ranch, but is forbidden from participating in a cattle roundup once he gets there. While waiting at the farm, he meets his boss's daughter and the two fall in love. After her father finds out, they must navigate his disapproval and reclaim the stolen farm.(n)

programme.title: Scene of the Crime
programme.desc: A tough Los Angeles detective investigates the murder of his ex-partner, a plainclothes policeman who may have been a dirty cop and involved in a gambling operation.(n)

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham One Two Three
programme.desc: Four men hijack a Manhattan subway train and hold it for a ransom of $1 million.(n)

programme.title: The Great Train Robbery
programme.desc: Three criminals attempt to steal an army shipment of gold bars from a moving locomotive in 19th-century England.(n)

programme.title: The Blue Angel
programme.desc: Marlene Dietrich plays a tawdry cabaret singer (introducing the song "Falling in Love Again") who becomes the object of obsession for a highly moral, elderly professor.(n)

programme.title: Kitty Foyle
programme.desc: A working-class woman marries a wealthy man for his money, rather than the poor doctor she genuinely loves, and quickly clashes with her husband's family. programme.title: Scene of the Crime

programme.desc: A pro-football player learns that he suffers from a potentially deadly heart condition, and must decide whether to play on rather or retire to a coaching position due to the demands of his pampered wife.(n)

A Best Picture winner. Gene Kelly stars and served as the film's choreographer. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Friendly Persuasion
programme.desc: William Wyler's beautifully made film about a Quaker family in Civil War Indiana, where the father struggles to adhere to his pacifist ways, while his teenage son undergoes a crisis of conscience over whether to sign up for military service or not and be judged a coward. Oscar nominated for Best Picture, Adapted Screenplay, Director, Sound, Supporting Actor (Anthony Perkins) and Song ("Thee I Love"). Remade in 1975. (cc).(n)

programme.desc: An exploration of the problems facing newlyweds who tied the knot on a whim, and an older married couple, the husband of whom got hitched because he stood to inherit his father-in-law's business. An adaptation of a Tennessee Williams play.(n)

programme.desc: Biopic of Chris Kyle, the most-celebrated sniper in American military history. In the aftermath of 9/11, Kyle decides to serve his country by becoming a Navy SEAL. But with each tour of duty, he grows more detached from his wife and children. (cc).

programme.title: Safe House
programme.desc: A rookie CIA operative (Ryan Reynolds) goes on the run with a rogue former intelligence officer (Denzel Washington) after a South African safe house comes under attack by heavily armed mercenaries. (repeat) (cc).

programme.desc: Castle contemplates a job opportunity from his agent (Debi Mazar) as he and Beckett investigate what could be their last case together---the murder of a woman found in a manhole. (repeat) (cc).

programme.desc: A dead man wearing vampire teeth is discovered in a graveyard with a stake through his heart. The probe leads Castle and Beckett to a group of vampire fetishists, and clues are revealed in a graphic novel the victim had been writing. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Castle

Tilda Swinton. Directed by Norman Jewison. Adapted from Brian Moore's fact-based novel by screenwriter Ronald Harwood. (cc).

programme.title: Collateral Beauty
programme.desc: A New York adman deals with the pain of losing a child by writing letters to Time, Death and Love. He is soon visited by representations of the three concepts, and they, along with his close friends, help him return to some semblance of a normal life. (cc).

programme.title: Weekend at Bernie's
programme.desc: A boss invites two underlings to his beach house with the intention of having them killed because they uncovered his illegal activities. However, when they arrive and discover the boss himself is dead, the pair spends the weekend pretending he's alive so that they can enjoy the place and figure out how to get themselves out of harm's way. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Why Him?
programme.desc: An adoring dad is horrified to discover that his daughter's tech-billionaire boyfriend is a tattooed, party-hearty lout. Despite the latter's heart of gold, the father refuses to warm to him—especially when he learns about his engagement plans. (cc).(n)

programme.title: View from the Top
programme.desc: A woman from a trailer park (Gwyneth Paltrow) aspires to become a flight attendant at a prestigious airline. Paltrow has first-class charm, but the gags fall flat. Christina Applegate, Mike Myers, Candice Bergen. Bruno Barreto directed. Rob Lowe and George Kennedy have cameos. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Never Been Kissed
programme.desc: Drew Barrymore enchants as a Chicago newspaper editor who relives her hellish teen years while on an undercover assignment at a local high school. Barrymore's great, but the film celebrates the fact that her character wins over the same type of “in crowd” that taunted her as a teen. David Arquette costars as her cool brother. Raja Gosnell is the director, and Barrymore served as executive producer. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Eight Below
programme.desc: Thrilling adventure yarn about eight sled dogs struggling to survive when bad weather leaves them marooned at an Antarctic research post. The fact-based film is similar to the 1983 Japanese film "Nankyoku Monogatari," which was released in the U.S. as "Antarctica." (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Breakfast Club
programme.desc: Five high-school students from different cliques spend a day-long detention together, and discover that they have more in common then they ever expected. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Tin Cup
programme.desc: Comedy about a talented but aimless golf instructor (Kevin Costner) who enters the U.S. Open in a drive to win the heart of a student (Rene Russo). Romeo: Cheech Marin. Simms: Don Johnson. Co-written and directed by Ron Shelton. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Time Traveler's Wife
programme.desc: Dramatic fantasy about a librarian whose genetic disorder causes him to hurtle through time when under extreme duress. Despite this condition, he tries to build a relationship with a young heiress. Based on the best-selling novel by author Audrey Niffenegger. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Where the Heart Is
programme.desc: While traveling to California with her boyfriend, a pregnant teen is abandoned at an Oklahoma Wal-Mart. She decides to stay, and makes a temporary home in the store while pondering her future. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Love Potion No. 9
programme.desc: Two nerdy scientists become irresistible after drinking a palm reader's secret formula. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Bananas
programme.desc: A neurotic New Yorker follows the woman he loves unrequitedly to a Central American country and becomes embroiled in a revolution, eventually becoming leader of the country. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Taps
programme.desc: Military academy cadets take up arms against developers who are plotting to demolish their school. Though a General tries to quell the rebellion, he too is inspired to stand for the school when the Army is called in to rout the boys. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Hours
programme.desc: Three women, separated by 80 years, struggle with similar crises linked by the novel Mrs. Dalloway. Author Virginia Woolf attempts to start writing that novel, a '50s housewife contemplates leaving her life behind and a modern-day book editor cares for a former boyfriend who's fighting AIDS. (cc).(n)

programme.desc: A bouncer is hired in a rowdy honky-tonk where brawling is a nightly event, but his efforts to clean it up are stifled by a local crime boss.

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości.

programme.title: Zranione uczucia

programme.title: Dzień dobry
programme.desc: Poranne pasmo muzyczne, w którym prezentowane są najlepsze teledyski artystów cieszących się dużą popularnością.

programme.title: Eska On The Beach
programme.desc: Wakacyjny program Eski TV nadawany prosto z najpiękniejszych plaż. Ola Kot zaprezentuje widzom wiele ciekawostek, a wśród nich najnowsze plotki, porady modowe oraz wieści muzyczne z kraju i ze świata. Nie zabraknie najnowszych piosenek i teledysków. Widzowie przekonają się, który utwór zasłuży sobie na miano hitu lata.

programme.title: Projekt Kamper
programme.desc: Filip Rudanacja zamienia swojego garbusa na atrakcyjnego kampera i wyrusza na wakacyjną wyprawę. Prowadzący oddaje się paradzie letnich wyzwań. Wypoczywa, szuka dobrej zabawy przy dźwiękach najlepszej muzyki i robi rzeczy, które każdy powinien wykonać podczas urlopu, jak zjedzenie gofra, czy rozstawienie parawanu.

programme.title: Eska Summer City news
programme.desc: Twórcy programu odwiedzają miejsca, w których odbywają się najciekawsze wakacyjne wydarzenia. Zawitają zarówno do największych polskich miast, jak i mniejszych ośrodków. Pojawią się na imprezach plenerowych, w klubach, na plażach, basenach, aquaparkach czy zawodach sportowych. Prowadzący zapytają napotkane tam osoby o to, jak spędzają lato i gdzie wypoczywają. Nie zabraknie rozmów z gwiazdami i gości specjalnych.

programme.title: Mobmania
programme.desc: Program o nowinkach technicznych. Autorzy przedstawiają najnowsze gadżety, smartfony itp.

programme.title: Będę grał w grę
programme.desc: Magazyn skierowany do miłośników gier komputerowych. Jego autorzy omawiają i testują najnowsze propozycje, które trafiają na rynek.

Wypoczywa, szuka dobrej zabawy przy dźwiękach najlepszej muzyki i robi rzeczy, które każdy powinien wykonać podczas urlopu, jak zjedzenie gofra, czy rozstawienie parawanu.

programme.title: Eska Summer City news
programme.desc: Twórcy programu odwiedzają miejsca, w których odbywają się najciekawsze wakacyjne wydarzenia. Zawitają zarówno do największych polskich miast, jak i mniejszych ośrodków. Pojawią się na imprezach plenerowych, w klubach, na plażach, basenach, aquaparkach czy zawodach sportowych. Prowadzący zapytają napotkane tam osoby o to, jak spędzają lato i gdzie wypoczywają. Nie zabraknie rozmów z gwiazdami i gości specjalnych.

programme.title: Przesłuchanie
programme.desc: W każdym odcinku przesłuchiwana jest jedna z gwiazd show-biznesu. Twórcy programu zadają jej niewygodne pytania.

programme.title: Eska Summer City news
programme.desc: Twórcy programu odwiedzają miejsca, w których odbywają się najciekawsze wakacyjne wydarzenia. Zawitają zarówno do największych polskich miast, jak i mniejszych ośrodków. programme.title: 10 hitów 1 po 2
programme.desc: Twórcy programu w każdym wydaniu prezentują 10 wybranych hitów. Utwory, będące największymi przebojami najsłynniejszych wykonawców, grane są jeden po drugim.

programme.title: Eska Summer City news

programme.title: Eska On The Beach
programme.desc: Wakacyjny program Eski TV nadawany prosto z najpiękniejszych plaż. Ola Kot zaprezentuje widzom wiele ciekawostek, a wśród nich najnowsze plotki, porady modowe oraz wieści muzyczne z kraju i ze świata. Nie zabraknie najnowszych piosenek i teledysków. Widzowie przekonają się, który utwór zasłuży sobie na miano hitu lata.

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości.(n)

Ola Kot zaprezentuje widzom wiele ciekawostek, a wśród nich najnowsze plotki, porady modowe oraz wieści muzyczne z kraju i ze świata. Nie zabraknie najnowszych piosenek i teledysków. Widzowie przekonają się, który utwór zasłuży sobie na miano hitu lata.

programme.title: Przesłuchanie
programme.desc: W każdym odcinku przesłuchiwana jest jedna z gwiazd show-biznesu. Twórcy programu zadają jej niewygodne pytania.

programme.title: 10 hitów 1 po 2
programme.desc: Twórcy programu w każdym wydaniu prezentują 10 wybranych hitów. Utwory, będące największymi przebojami najsłynniejszych wykonawców, grane są jeden po drugim.

programme.title: Hity na czasie
programme.desc: Zestawienie najpopularniejszych utworów muzycznych i teledysków, które znajdują się na szczytach różnych list przebojów.

programme.title: Projekt Kamper
programme.desc: Filip Rudanacja zamienia swojego garbusa na atrakcyjnego kampera i wyrusza na wakacyjną wyprawę. Prowadzący oddaje się paradzie letnich wyzwań. Wypoczywa, szuka dobrej zabawy przy dźwiękach najlepszej muzyki i robi rzeczy, które każdy powinien wykonać podczas urlopu, jak zjedzenie gofra, czy rozstawienie parawanu.

programme.title: Polska noc

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości.

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. programme.title: Eska Summer City news
programme.desc: Twórcy programu odwiedzają miejsca, w których odbywają się najciekawsze wakacyjne wydarzenia. Zawitają zarówno do największych polskich miast, jak i mniejszych ośrodków. Pojawią się na imprezach plenerowych, w klubach, na plażach, basenach, aquaparkach czy zawodach sportowych. Prowadzący zapytają napotkane tam osoby o to, jak spędzają lato i gdzie wypoczywają. Nie zabraknie rozmów z gwiazdami i gości specjalnych.

programme.title: Mobmania
programme.desc: Program o nowinkach technicznych. Autorzy przedstawiają najnowsze gadżety, smartfony itp.

programme.title: Będę grał w grę
programme.desc: Magazyn skierowany do miłośników gier komputerowych. Jego autorzy omawiają i testują najnowsze propozycje, które trafiają na rynek.

Ola Kot zaprezentuje widzom wiele ciekawostek, a wśród nich najnowsze plotki, porady modowe oraz wieści muzyczne z kraju i ze świata. Nie zabraknie najnowszych piosenek i teledysków. Widzowie przekonają się, który utwór zasłuży sobie na miano hitu lata.(n)

programme.title: Eska Summer City news
programme.desc: Twórcy programu odwiedzają miejsca, w których odbywają się najciekawsze wakacyjne wydarzenia. Zawitają zarówno do największych polskich miast, jak i mniejszych ośrodków. Pojawią się na imprezach plenerowych, w klubach, na plażach, basenach, aquaparkach czy zawodach sportowych. Prowadzący zapytają napotkane tam osoby o to, jak spędzają lato i gdzie wypoczywają. Nie zabraknie rozmów z gwiazdami i gości specjalnych.(n)

programme.title: Projekt Kamper
programme.desc: Filip Rudanacja zamienia swojego garbusa na atrakcyjnego kampera i wyrusza na wakacyjną wyprawę. Prowadzący oddaje się paradzie letnich wyzwań. Wypoczywa, szuka dobrej zabawy przy dźwiękach najlepszej muzyki i robi rzeczy, które każdy powinien wykonać podczas urlopu, jak zjedzenie gofra, czy rozstawienie parawanu.(n)

programme.title: Ice Age 2 The Meltdown
programme.desc: In this sequel to the animated hit, Manny, Sid and Diego flee their melting homeland and meet a female mammoth who thinks she's a possum.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel dates a guy who's similar to Ross; Joey can get a part if he sleeps with the casting director; Fun Bobby is no fun without alcohol. (repeat).

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Lesbian Wedding
programme.desc: Rachel's mother (Marlo Thomas) considers ending her marriage; Carol decides to marry her lover, Susan; Phoebe believes she's possessed. Newt Gingrich's sister Candace has a cameo as a minister. (repeat).

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One After the Super Bowl

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One After the Super Bowl
programme.desc: Conclusion. Ross learns Marcel is working on a movie, and the film's makeup artist seems to want Chandler; Monica and Rachel fight over Jean-Claude Van Damme, who appears as himself. Susie: Julia Roberts. (repeat).

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Prom Video
programme.desc: Monica brings some things home from her parents' house, including a prom video; Rachel tells Ross that she doesn't think it will work out between them. (repeat).

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross and Rachel...You Know
programme.desc: Ross's work hinders the evolution of his and Rachel's romance; Monica has eyes for an older opthalmologist (Tom Selleck); Joey and Chandler enjoy a big-screen TV. Ross: David Schwimmer. Rachel: Jennifer Aniston. Monica: Courteney Cox. (repeat).

programme.title: Mom
programme.desc: Christy realizes life is easier with Bonnie in the house, but she has trouble accepting that fact. Meanwhile, Baxter sets up camp in the driveway. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Mom
programme.desc: Christy and Bonnie try to help a sick friend and her eight cats. Meanwhile, the reality of pregnancy frustrates Violet. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Mom
programme.desc: Bonnie begins dating Chef Rudy, with Christy stuck in the middle. Jon Cryer directed the episode. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Mom
programme.desc: Christy sprains her ankle but refuses help from Bonnie. Elsewhere, Luke reaches out to Baxter for fatherhood advice. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: George Lopez

programme.title: George Lopez

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Barry's dream of having a dog comes true, but he's disappointed when the pup takes an immediate liking to Murray; at the same time, Beverly is upset not to be included when Erica and Lainey plan a girls-only sleepover. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Barry joins the Army ROTC program after seeing the movie "Top Gun." But when the going gets tough, quitting isn't an option thanks to Murray, and so Beverly decides it's her duty to train alongside her son. Meanwhile, Pops enlists Adam's help catching the eye of a certain librarian. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob writes a letter to the Vikings, hoping to learn more about them so he can get Krusty Krab's new Viking-themed promotion; SpongeBob cuts a boating-school class in order to go to a book signing by his favorite superheroes. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob resorts to underhanded measures to learn the mystery behind Patrick's secret box. Later, Squidward forms a marching band. (repeat) (cc).

programme.desc: A playful dragon gets out of one of Alex's books and the pups need to get it back; Francois' trailer becomes unhooked and all of the critters get loose. (repeat).

programme.desc: When Ms. Marjorie brings her bookmobile to Everest and the kids of the mountains, Maynard accidentally sets the van rolling and goes off on a wild ride; Mayor Humdinger has been carving his face into the cliffs of Adventure Bay. (repeat).

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.sub-title: Pups Save the Flying Food; Pups Save a Ferris Wheel

programme.title: Paw Patrol

programme.desc: Francois and Turbot discover an underwater volcano that is about to erupt while Farmer Yumi and Mayor Goodway are unknowingly scuba diving nearby; Farmer Al's farm gets flooded. (repeat).

programme.desc: Mr. Krabs loses patrons because of Plankton, so he resorts to giving food away for free; SpongeBob gets his pals to help him fix up his pineapple home, which is in need of repairs. (repeat) (cc).

programme.desc: SpongeBob acquires sudden wealth, as well as new friends who want to help him spend his money, leaving him less time for Patrick; Squidward tries to avoid SpongeBob so he can get to his men's chorus audition on time. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: So Awkward
programme.desc: Traditionally Martha and Jas have had a joint birthday party, with their birthdays falling close together. Martha and Mrs Fitzgerald have up until now led the way in terms of the choice of party theme - characteristically formal, complete with lobster and butler - and not much fun. When Jas and her dad suggest `shaking it up' a bit this year and introducing a Mexican theme, it leads first of all to the parents falling out and then to Martha and Jas themselves. It's the battle of the lobster vs the Mexican donkey pinata called Percy.(n)

programme.title: So Awkward
programme.desc: The class learns about the Women's Movement and feminism, and the girls put what their lessons into action as they protest against needless airbrushing of year-book photos.(n)

programme.title: So Awkward
programme.desc: Jas decides to follow in her dad's footsteps and try out for the junior hockey team. Mr Salford was a legendary hockey goalie in his time at the school. When the try-outs are cancelled due to the coach not being available, Mr Salford steps in and offers his services as coach. Mrs Griggs is horrified - she could do without the chaos he inevitably brings with him - but he won't take no for an answer. Jas and her father are really superstitious and when things start going wrong Jas thinks she's jinxed, and then that she's passed on the jinx to her dad. When she's not picked as goalie for the team Jas is actually relieved - it must mean she's still jinxed and hasn't passed on the jinx to her dad. Eventually Jas does need to play in goal, but when she saves a crucial penalty she and her dad are delighted to realise they are not jinxed after all, just accident-prone! Meanwhile, Martha & Ollie get paranoid that Cassie & Maxwell are usurping them. They've taken over their favourite nook in the library and when they turn up to do their regular security check on Mrs Rennison's computer Cassie and Maxwell have already been there and done it. They decide they've got to get their own back and they sabotage a fizzy drinks maker Cassie and Maxwell have created to provide refreshments at the hockey match. They turn up the CO2 dial and everyone gets very burpy! Lily is feeling abandoned by her friends - they all seem too busy to hang out with her. Matt advises her that a big gesture could do the trick. When she unfurls a giant banner during the hockey match declaring her admiration for her friends it's really embarrassing. It does prompt Martha and Ollie to do the right thing, though, and confess to Cassie and Maxwell that they sabotaged their fizzy drinks machine and does inspire Jas to save that crucial penalty.(n)

programme.title: So Awkward
programme.desc: Mrs Griggs decides that a 'social skills' class could be beneficial for certain pupils - including Martha, Rufus, Cassie and Maxwell. When Mrs Griggs tells Martha a winning personality as well as academic achievement is vital in order to get into a top university, Martha panics and is determined to succeed in the social skills class and prove she does indeed have a winning personality. Mrs Griggs volunteers a reluctant Mr Malone to take the classes and hands him a book written by her beloved 'Guru Holeman' called Being Whole as a manual to help him. When Lily is mistakenly led to believe by Jas that Matt is emigrating to Australia she is distraught that he hasn't even told her he's leaving. She becomes convinced it's because she's too easy-going that he hasn't even bothered to tell her. She begs Mrs Griggs to let her go to social skills class, too, so she can learn to be less easy-going. Ollie is then sent there for being too pompous and Jas for being too exuberant. Worn down, eventually Mr Malone has had enough of teaching the class Mrs Griggs' way. He throws the book in the bin and gives the pupils a new exercise of his own - wearing blindfolds so they can feel free without worrying how people see them. It works - a blindfolded Lily is able to tell Matt she'll really miss him when he emigrates, which prompts Matt to tell her that he's not going anywhere. And Martha realises she's doing just fine with the personality she already has.(n)
